info.description: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products
info.title: FHIR R4 ChargeItem Resource

ChargeItem.description: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products

code.description: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code

function.description: What type of performance was done
